subtitle: hi everyone and welcome to day 37 in the
counting of the Omer my name is nihal
Oshman and I'm the author of what would
you do if you weren't afraid and I take
much inspiration from Rabbi Jacobson's
Homer guide and today it's day 37 of
counting today is about bonding it's
very important that we connect with
others that we bond that we establish
relationships but it's also important to
observe those relationships to reflect
on them are we bonding with the right
people what are we bringing from and
within ourselves to relationships can we
connect with people that are better for
us can we become better versions of
ourselves for those relationships so
today is the energy of bonding of
connecting of relationships
and reflecting on that
